definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: China's iron-ore import volumes actually fell in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 中国2010年铁矿石进口量反而下降。

sentences.english: By contrast, almost every Indian has a basic English vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 反而，几乎每个印度人都了解基本的英语词汇。

sentences.english: A bit long perhaps but otherwise nonoffensive and kind of sweet.
sentences.chinese: 虽然可能有点长，但却毫无恶意，反而有种温馨感。

sentences.english: Sometimes, the love between lovers will not separate die, but will become deeper.
sentences.chinese: 有时，恋人间的分离不会令爱磨灭，反而会变得更深。

sentences.english: Instead, it should be the results that matter.
sentences.chinese: 反而，应该是具有意义的结果。

sentences.english: You will only injure yourself if you take notice of despicable enemies.
sentences.chinese: 如果去在意卑劣的敌人，反而会身受其害。

sentences.english: Why on the contrary do those so-called multifunctional home appliances make person antipathetic?
sentences.chinese: 那些所谓的多功能家电为什么反而使人反感？

sentences.english: In spite of years of investment, the situation is worsening.
sentences.chinese: 尽管年年的投资，状况反而更加糟糕了。
他们反而因为等待获得奖赏。

sentences.english: Instead of being faint or light pink, these new diamonds are hot pink.
sentences.chinese: 反而受到微弱或浅粉色，这些新的钻石热粉红。

sentences.english: In states where unemployment didn't climb as much, claims dropped.
sentences.chinese: 在失业率升幅较小的州，男性的投诉率反而下降。

sentences.english: What word is pronounced quicker by adding a syllable to it?
sentences.chinese: 什么单词加一个音节反而读得更快？

sentences.english: Occurring and harming of the wheat aphids have not decreased, and there is a more serious trend instead.
sentences.chinese: 麦蚜的发生危害没有减轻，反而有日趋严重的趋势。

sentences.english: Game of this kind of bloodcurdling, let players feel a kind of excitant pleasant sensation instead.
sentences.chinese: 这种恐怖的游戏，反而让玩家们感到一种刺激性快感。

sentences.english: So they may have to accept lower margins instead.
sentences.chinese: 因此他们有可能要反而接受利润的减少。

sentences.english: Instead, I was made to be unique.
sentences.chinese: 反而，我被创造成独一无二的。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
